name: Mystery Trackers: Blackrow's Secret
storyline: It's been two hundred years since the plague swept through here... Authorities quarantined the area around Blackrow Mansion, and it hasn't been opened since. But now, an up-and-coming starlet is receiving strange threats that have drawn her straight to the quarantine zone. What is hiding behind the rusted gates of the Forbidden District? Play innovative new mini-games and explore gorgeous hidden-object puzzles as you track down the truth behind Blackrow's secret!
